sentence: Looking at options trading activity among components of the Russell 3000 index, there is noteworthy activity today in Salesforce.com Inc (Symbol: CRM), where a total volume of 27,833 contracts has been traded thus far today, a contract volume which is representative of approximately 2.8 million underlying shares (given that every 1 contract represents 100 underlying shares).
That number works out to 65.2% of CRM's average daily trading volume over the past month, of 4.3 million shares.
Particularly high volume was seen for the $128 strike call option expiring May 18, 2018 , with 1,869 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 186,900 underlying shares of CRM.

Below is a chart showing CRM's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $128 strike highlighted in orange:

Penn National Gaming Inc (Symbol: PENN) saw options trading volume of 8,973 contracts, representing approximately 897,300 underlying shares or approximately 56% of PENN's average daily trading volume over the past month, of 1.6 million shares.
Particularly high volume was seen for the $33 strike call option expiring July 20, 2018 , with 3,034 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 303,400 underlying shares of PENN.

Below is a chart showing PENN's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $33 strike highlighted in orange:

And Burlington Stores Inc (Symbol: BURL) saw options trading volume of 3,838 contracts, representing approximately 383,800 underlying shares or approximately 55.4% of BURL's average daily trading volume over the past month, of 693,285 shares.
Especially high volume was seen for the $141 strike call option expiring May 18, 2018 , with 1,525 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 152,500 underlying shares of BURL.

Below is a chart showing BURL's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $141 strike highlighted in orange:
